## TranslationService.fetchTranslationJob() method

Gets full details for the translation job with the specified job ID. This operation returns an instance of 'TranslationJob' type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static fetchTranslationJob({ jobId, }: {
        jobId: number;
    }): CancelablePromise<TranslationJob>;
```
